Mozilla applications gained support for <canvas> starting with Gecko 1.8 (i.e. Firefox 1.5). The element was originally introduced by Apple for the OS X Dashboard and Safari. Internet Explorer supports <canvas> from version 9 onwards; for earlier versions of IE, a page can effectively add support for <canvas> by including a script from Google's Explorer Canvas project. Google Chrome and Opera 9 also support <canvas>.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla应用程序从Gecko 1.8（即Firefox 1.5）开始获得了对 <canvas> 的支持。该元素最初是由Apple为OS X仪表板和Safari引入的。 Internet Explorer 从版本9开始支持 <canvas> 。对于早期版本的IE，页面可以通过包含Google的Explorer Canvas项目中的脚本来有效地添加对 <canvas> 的支持。 Google Chrome和Opera 9也支持 <canvas> 。

trans-unit.target: Mozilla 定义了一组只针对 XUL 内容的非标准属性。

trans-unit.source: Mozilla distinguishes a document.domain property that has never been set from one explicitly set to the same domain as the document's URL, even though the property returns the same value in both cases. One document is allowed to access another if they have both set document.domain to the same value, indicating their intent to cooperate, or neither has set document.domain and the domains in the URLs are the same (implementation). Were it not for this special policy, every site would be subject to XSS from its subdomains (for example, https://bugzilla.mozilla.org could be attacked by bug attachments on https://bug*.bugzilla.mozilla.org).
trans-unit.target: Mozilla将从未设置的 document.domain 属性与一个显式设置为与文档URL相同的域的方法区分开来，即使在两种情况下该属性返回相同的值。如果一个文档都将 document.domain 设置为相同的值（表示它们的合作意图），或者两个 document.domain 或文档中的URL都没有设置相同，则允许访问另一个文档（实现）。如果不是这个特殊的政策，每个站点都将受到XSS从它的子域（例如，https://bugzilla.mozilla.org可以通过错误的附件上的https攻击：//bug*.bugzilla.mozilla.org ）。

trans-unit.source: Mozilla extensions for use by JS-implemented event targets to implement on* properties. See also WebIDL bindings.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla扩展，供JS实现的事件目标使用以实现on *属性。另请参见WebIDL绑定。

trans-unit.source: Mozilla supports the ability to drag multiple items using some additional non-standard methods. trans-unit.source: Much of the information in this section is based in part on the blog post Demystifyijng WebRTC's Data Channel Message Size Limitations, written by Lennart Grahl. He goes into a bit more detail there, but as browsers have been updated since then some of it may be out-of-date. In addition, as time goes by, it will become more so, especially once EOR and ndata support are fully integrated in the major browsers.
trans-unit.target: 本节中的大部分信息部分基于Lennart Grahl撰写的博客文章Demystifyijng WebRTC的“数据通道消息大小限制”。他在那里详细介绍了一些细节，但是由于自那时以来浏览器已经更新，因此其中一些可能已过时。此外，随着时间的流逝，它将变得越来越重要，尤其是在主要浏览器中完全集成了EOR和ndata支持之后。

trans-unit.source: Mutation observers are intended to let you be able to watch the desired set of nodes over time, even if the direct connections between those nodes are severed. If you begin watching a subtree of nodes, and a portion of that subtree is detached and moved elsewhere in the DOM, you continue to watch the detached segment of nodes, receiving the same callbacks as before the nodes were detached from the original subtree.
trans-unit.target: 突变观察者的目的是让你能够随着时间的推移观察所需的节点集,即使这些节点之间的直接连接被切断。如果你开始观察一个节点的子树,而这个子树的一部分被分离出来并移动到DOM中的其他地方,你将继续观察被分离出来的节点部分,接收与节点从原始子树中分离出来之前相同的回调。

trans-unit.source: New documents have a single Text node for each block of text. Over time, more Text nodes may be created as the document's content changes. The Node.normalize() method merges adjacent Text objects back into a single node for each block of text.
trans-unit.target: 新文档的每个文本块都有一个“ Text 节点。随着时间的流逝，随着文档内容的更改，可能会创建更多的 Text 节点。所述 Node.normalize() 方法合并邻接 Text 对象转化成文本的每个块的单个节点。

trans-unit.target: 新功能测试。

trans-unit.source: New projects should generally avoid using returnValue, although they may if they choose to do so.
trans-unit.target: 新项目通常应避免使用 returnValue ，尽管他们可以选择这样做。

trans-unit.source: New promise-based syntax
trans-unit.target: 新的基于承诺的语法

trans-unit.source: New senders
trans-unit.target: 新发件人

trans-unit.source: New spec.
trans-unit.target: 新规格。

trans-unit.source: New windows can have menubar missing, scrollbars missing, status bar missing, window resizability disabled, etc.; new tabs can not be missing those functionalities or toolbars (or at least, the toolbars which are present by default). Therefore, tab-browsing is preferred by a lot of users because the normal user-interface of the browser window they prefer is kept intact, remains stable.
trans-unit.target: 新窗口可以缺少menubar,缺少滚动条,缺少状态栏,禁用窗口大小调整功能等;新标签页不能缺少这些功能或工具栏(至少是默认存在的工具栏)。因此,标签浏览是很多用户的首选,因为他们所喜欢的浏览器窗口的正常用户界面保持完整,保持稳定。

trans-unit.source: Newer promise-based syntax:
trans-unit.target: 较新的基于承诺的语法。

trans-unit.source: Next »
trans-unit.target: 下一个 ”

trans-unit.source: Next comes the fragment shader. Its role is to return the color of each pixel in the shape being rendered. Since we're drawing a solid, untextured object with no lighting applied, this is exceptionally simple:
trans-unit.target: 接下来是片段着色器。它的作用是返回正在渲染的形状中每个像素的颜色。由于我们绘制的是一个没有应用光照的实体、无纹理的对象,所以这一点异常简单。

trans-unit.source: Next comes the function updatePosition(). This function takes as input the distance the ship is to be moved, where positive is a forward movement and negative is a backward movement. This function computes the new position of the ship given the distance moved and the current direction the ship is facing. It also handles ensuring that the ship wraps across the boundaries of the play field instead of vanishing.
trans-unit.target: 接下来是功能 updatePosition() 。该功能将船舶要移动的距离作为输入，其中正数表示前进，负数表示后退。给定移动的距离和船舶面向的当前方向，此功能将计算船舶的新位置。它还可以确保船舶环绕运动场的边界而不是消失。

trans-unit.source: Next is activation. When the service worker is installed, it then receives an activate event. The primary use of onactivate is for cleanup of resources used in previous versions of a Service worker script.
trans-unit.target: 接下来是激活。安装服务工作者后，它将收到激活事件。 onactivate 的主要用途是清除Service Worker脚本早期版本中使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: 今后的步骤

trans-unit.source: Next we create a <ul> element in our HTML to contain our results, and grab a reference to it in our JavaScript:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们在HTML中创建一个 <ul> 元素以包含我们的结果，并在我们的JavaScript中获取对其的引用：

trans-unit.source: Next we define our drawGeometry() function. Most of this is just general WebGL code required to draw our 3D cube. You'll see some WebVR-specific parts in the mvTranslate() and mvRotate() function calls — these pass matrices into the WebGL program that define the translation and rotation of the cube for the current frame
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们定义 drawGeometry() 函数。其中大多数只是绘制3D立方体所需的常规WebGL代码。您将在 mvTranslate() 和 mvRotate() 函数调用中看到一些特定于WebVR的部分-这些将矩阵传递到WebGL程序中，这些矩阵定义了当前帧的多维数据集的平移和旋转

trans-unit.source: Next we have variables which reference the DOM elements we need to interact with. These elements are:
trans-unit.target: 接下来我们有一些变量,这些变量引用了我们需要与之交互的DOM元素。这些元素是

trans-unit.source: Next we look to see if the RTCPeerConnection.getSenders() method is implemented. If it is, we call it on callerPC and get the first entry in the returned list of senders; this is the RTCRtpSender responsible for transmitting data for the first audio track on the call (which is the track we'll send DTMF over). We then obtain the RTCRtpSender's dtmf property, which is an RTCDTMFSender object that can send DTMF on the connection, from the caller to the receiver.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们看看是否实现了 RTCPeerConnection.getSenders() 方法。如果是的话，我们在 callerPC 上调用它，并在返回的发件人列表中获得第一个条目；这是 RTCRtpSender ,负责为呼叫中的第一个音频轨道（这是我们将发送DTMF的轨道）传输数据。然后，我们获得 RTCRtpSender 的 dtmf 属性，它是一个 RTCDTMFSender 对象，可以在连接上将 DTMF从调用者发送到接收者。

trans-unit.source: Next we need to add code to our drawScene() function to draw using the cube's index buffer, adding new gl.bindBuffer() and gl.drawElements() calls:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们需要向 drawScene() 函数添加代码以使用多维数据集的索引缓冲区进行绘制，并添加新的 gl.bindBuffer() 和 gl.drawElements() 调用：

trans-unit.source: Next we set up the options for the IntersectionObserver which will monitor target elements (ads, in our case) for intersection changes relative to the document. The options are configured to watch for intersections with the document's viewport (by setting root to null). We have no margins to extend or contract the intersection root's rectangle; we want to match the boundaries of the document's viewport exactly for intersection purposes. And the threshold is set to an array containing the values 0.0 and 0.75; this will cause our callback to execute whenever a targeted element becomes completely obscured or first starts to become unobscured (intersection ratio 0.0) or passes through 75% visible in either direction (intersection ratio 0.75).
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们为 IntersectionObserver 设置选项，该选项将监视目标元素（在本例中为ads）相对于文档的相交更改。这些选项配置为监视与文档视口的相交（通过将 root 设置为 null ）。我们没有边界可以扩展或收缩交点根的矩形；我们希望完全为相交目的匹配文档视口的边界。和 threshold 设置为包含值0.0和0.75的数组；每当目标元素被完全遮挡或首先开始变得不被遮挡时（交集比率0.0）或通过任一方向上可见的75％（交集比率0.75），这都会导致我们的回调执行。

trans-unit.source: Next, a new notification is created using the Notification() constructor. This must be passed a title argument, and can optionally be passed an options object to specify options, such as text direction, body text, icon to display, notification sound to play, and more.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，使用 Notification() 构造函数创建一个新的通知。该参数必须传递给title参数，并且可以选择传递给选项对象以指定选项，例如文本方向，正文，要显示的图标，要播放的通知声音等。

trans-unit.source: Next, an example showing a BiquadFilterNode having some values set. These are examples of k-rate AudioParam's, as the values are set for the entire audio block at once.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，显示一个 BiquadFilterNode 设置了一些值的示例。这些是k速率AudioParam的示例，因为会立即为整个音频块设置值。

trans-unit.source: Next, draw a green box up top and behind the red box.
trans-unit.target: 接着,在上面和红盒子后面画一个绿色的盒子。

trans-unit.source: Next, fill the canvas with a solid colour to start
trans-unit.target: 接下来,用纯色填充画布,开始

trans-unit.source: Next, isolate the visual part of the media stream. Do this by calling MediaStream.getVideoTracks(). This returns an array of MediaStreamTrack objects. The code below assumes that the first item in the MediaStreamTrack array is the one to use. You can use the properties of the MediaStreamTrack objects to select the one you need.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，隔离媒体流的可视部分。通过调用 MediaStream.getVideoTracks() 来执行此操作。这将返回 MediaStreamTrack 对象的数组。下面的代码假定 MediaStreamTrack 数组中的第一项是要使用的项。您可以使用 MediaStreamTrack 对象的属性来选择所需的对象。

trans-unit.source: Next, it's necessary to add the code look up the attribute location for the colors and setup that attribute for the shader program:
trans-unit.target: 接下来,需要添加代码查找颜色的属性位置,并为着色器程序设置该属性。

trans-unit.source: Next, it's time to set up the custom data properties to track the ad's visibility data by setting adBox.dataset.totalViewTime and adBox.dataset.lastViewStarted to 0.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，是时候通过将 adBox.dataset.totalViewTime 和 adBox.dataset.lastViewStarted 设置为0 来设置自定义数据属性以跟踪广告的可见性数据。

trans-unit.source: Next, let's look at the way we manage the tasks that need to be performed. We're going to do this by creating a FIFO queue of tasks, which we'll run as time allows during the idle callback period.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,让我们看看我们管理需要执行的任务的方式。我们将通过创建一个任务的FIFO队列来实现,在空闲回调期间,我们将在时间允许的情况下运行这个队列。

trans-unit.source: Next, the GainNodegainNode1 is created to handle the volume for the non-linked oscillator (oscNode1). We set that gain to 0.5. We also create gainNode2 and gainNode3, setting their values to match gainNode1, then set the value of the volume slider to the same value, so it is synchronized with the gain level it controls.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，创建 GainNode gainNode1 来处理非链接振荡器（ oscNode1 ）的音量。我们将该增益设置为0.5。我们还创建了 gainNode2 和 gainNode3 ，将它们的值设置为与 gainNode1 匹配，然后将音量滑块的值设置为相同的值，以便使其与它控制的增益级别同步。

trans-unit.source: Next, the current rotation vector is computed by converting the current rotation in degrees (currentAngle) into radians, then setting the first component of the rotation vector to the sine of that value and the second component to the cosine. The currentRotation vector is now the location of the point on the unit circle located at the angle currentAngle.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，通过将当前旋转度数（ currentAngle ）转换为弧度，然后将旋转向量的第一分量设置为该值的正弦，并将第二分量设置为余弦，来计算当前旋转向量。现在， currentRotation 向量是单位圆上点在 currentAngle 角处的位置。

trans-unit.source: Next, the event handlers for the caller are established. We'll cover these in detail later.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,建立调用者的事件处理程序。我们将在后面详细介绍这些。

trans-unit.source: Next, to actually rasterize the data into pixels, the fragment shader evaluates everything on a per pixel basis, setting a single color.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,为了真正将数据栅格化为像素,片段着色器以每个像素为基础评估一切,设置单一的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Next, we cancel the animation loop previously set in motion by the Window.requestAnimationFrame() call inside the drawScene() function, and instead invoke drawVRScene(). This function renders the same scene as before, but with some special WebVR magic going on. The loop inside here is maintained by WebVR's special VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame method.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们 cancel the animation loop 先前由 drawScene() 函数内的 Window.requestAnimationFrame() 调用设置的动画循环，而是调用 drawVRScene() 。此功能呈现与以前相同的场景，但仍带有一些特殊的WebVR魔术。WebVR的特殊 VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame 方法维护此处的循环。

trans-unit.source: Next, we add a message handler on the port to do the calculation and return the result to the main thread. Setting up this message handler in the worker thread also implicitly opens the port connection back to the parent thread, so the call to port.start() is not actually needed, as noted above.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们在端口上添加一个 message 处理程序以进行计算并将结果返回到主线程。在工作线程中设置此 message 处理程序还会隐式地打开与父线程的端口连接，因此如上所述，实际上不需要调用 port.start() 。

trans-unit.source: Next, we attach each <td> element to its parent <tr> element using
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用以下命令将每个<td>元素附加到其父<tr>元素

trans-unit.source: Next, we attach each <tr> element to the parent <tbody> element using
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用以下命令将每个<tr>元素附加到父<tbody>元素

trans-unit.source: Next, we attach the <table> element to its parent <body> element using
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用以下方法将<table>元素附加到其父<body>元素

trans-unit.source: Next, we attach the <tbody> element to its parent <table> element using
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用<tbody>元素附加到其父<table>元素

trans-unit.source: Next, we call VRDisplay.getFrameData(), passing it the name of the variable that we want to use to contain the frame data. We initialized this earlier on — frameData. After the call completes, this variable will contain the data need to render the next frame to the VR device, packaged up as a VRFrameData object. This contains things like projection and view matrices for rendering the scene correctly for the left and right eye view, and the current VRPose object, which contains data on the VR display such as orientation, position, etc.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们调用 VRDisplay.getFrameData() ，将要用来包含帧数据的变量的名称传递给它。我们之前在— frameData 上对此进行了初始化。调用完成后，此变量将包含将下一帧呈现给VR设备所需的数据，打包为 VRFrameData 对象。它包含诸如投影和视图矩阵之类的东西，用于正确地渲染左右眼视图的场景，以及当前的 VRPose 对象，其中包含VR显示器上的数据，例如方向，位置等。

trans-unit.source: Next, we check to see if we already have an idle callback created; if taskHandle is 0, we know there isn't an idle callback yet, so we call requestIdleCallback() to create one. It's configured to call a function called runTaskQueue(), which we'll look at shortly, and with a timeout of 1 second, so that it will be run at least once per second even if there isn't any actual idle time available.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，检查是否已经创建了一个空闲回调。如果 taskHandle 为0，我们知道还没有空闲的回调，因此我们调用 requestIdleCallback() 创建一个。它被配置为调用一个名为 runTaskQueue() 的函数，稍后我们将对其进行查看， timeout 为1秒，因此即使没有可用的实际空闲时间，它也至少每秒运行一次。

trans-unit.source: Next, we check whether done is true. If so, there are no more chunks to read (the value is undefined) so we return out of the function and close the custom stream with ReadableStreamDefaultController.close():
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们检查done是否为 true 。如果是这样，就不再有更多的块要读取（值是 undefined ），因此我们返回该函数并使用 ReadableStreamDefaultController.close() 关闭自定义流：

trans-unit.source: Next, we clear the canvas of what had been drawn on it before to get ready for the new visualization display:
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们要清除画布上之前绘制的内容,为新的可视化显示做好准备。

trans-unit.source: Next, we create an HTML structure like the following, inserting it into our clip container, which is an <article> element.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们创建一个如下所示的HTML结构，将其插入到我们的clip容器中，该容器是一个 <article> 元素。

trans-unit.source: Next, we create an event handler to start speaking the text entered into the text field. We are using an onsubmit handler on the form so that the action happens when
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们创建一个事件处理程序以开始说出输入到文本字段中的文本。我们在表单上使用了onsubmit处理程序，以便在

trans-unit.source: Next, we create some utility functions that will get used later.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们创建一些以后会用到的实用函数。

trans-unit.source: Next, we created the <tbody> element, which is a child of the <table> element.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们创建了<tbody>元素，它是<table>元素的子元素。

trans-unit.source: Next, we establish the FileReader to handle asynchronously loading the image and attaching it to the img element. After creating the new FileReader object, we set up its onload function and then call readAsDataURL() to start the read operation in the background. When the entire contents of the image file are loaded, they are converted into a data: URL which is passed to the onload callback. Our implementation of this routine sets the img element's src attribute to the loaded image which results in the image appearing in the thumbnail on the user's screen.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们建立 FileReader 来处理异步加载图像并将其附加到 img 元素。创建新的 FileReader 对象之后，我们设置其 onload 函数，然后调用 readAsDataURL() 在后台启动读取操作。加载图像文件的全部内容后，它们将转换为 data: URL，该URL传递给 onload 回调。我们对该例程的实现将 img 元素的 src 属性设置为已加载的图像，这导致该图像出现在用户屏幕的缩略图中。

trans-unit.source: Next, we get all the p elements that are descendants of the body via
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们通过以下方式得到所有的p元素,它们是主体的后代

trans-unit.source: Next, we grab the time domain data and copy it into our array
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们抓取时域数据,并将其复制到我们的数组中。

trans-unit.source: Next, we have a <canvas> element into which the captured frames are stored, potentially manipulated in some way, and then converted into an output image file. This canvas is kept hidden by styling the canvas with display:none, to avoid cluttering up the screen — the user does not need to see this intermediate stage.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们有一个 <canvas> 元素，将捕获的帧存储在其中，可能以某种方式进行处理，然后转换为输出图像文件。通过使用 display :none 设置画布的样式，可以使该画布保持隐藏状态，以避免使屏幕混乱—用户无需查看此中间阶段。

trans-unit.source: Next, we have two form inputs that allow you to set the anchorOffset and focusOffset — they both have a default value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们有两个表单输入，可用于设置 anchorOffset 和 focusOffset －它们的默认值均为0。

trans-unit.source: Next, we iterate over each octave in the note frequencies table. For each octave, we use Object.entries() to get a list of the notes in that octave.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们遍历音符频率表中的每个八度。对于每个八度，我们使用 Object.entries() 获取该八度中的音符列表。

trans-unit.source: Next, we need to establish our event handlers to change the text content of the box when the transition begins and ends.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,我们需要建立我们的事件处理程序,以便在过渡开始和结束时改变盒子的文本内容。

trans-unit.source: Next, we need to figure out which voice to use. We use the HTMLSelectElementselectedOptions property to return the currently selected <option> element. We then use this element's data-name attribute, finding the SpeechSynthesisVoice object whose name matches this attribute's value. We set the matching voice object to be the value of the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.voice property.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们需要弄清楚要使用哪种声音。我们使用 HTMLSelectElement selectedOptions 属性返回当前选择的 <option> 元素。然后，我们使用该元素的 data-name 属性，查找其名称与该属性的值匹配的 SpeechSynthesisVoice 对象。我们将匹配的语音对象设置为 SpeechSynthesisUtterance.voice 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Next, we post a confirmation message back to the main page via the message channel by calling MessagePort.postMessage on MessageChannel.port2 that was initially transfered to the IFrame.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们通过调用最初已传输到IFrame的 MessageChannel.port2 上的 MessagePort.postMessage ，通过消息通道将确认消息发布回主页。

trans-unit.source: Next, we set up an event listener for the "Apply Constraints" button. If it's clicked and there's not already media in use, we call startVideo(), and let that function handle starting the stream with the specified settings in place. Otherwise, we follow these steps to apply the updated constraints to the already-active stream:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们为“应用约束”按钮设置一个事件侦听器。如果单击它，并且尚未使用任何媒体，则调用 startVideo() ，然后让该函数处理具有指定设置的流来启动流。否则，我们将按照以下步骤将更新的约束应用于已处于活动状态的流：

trans-unit.source: Next, we set up the cone of our spatialised sound, determining the area in which it can be heard:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们设置空间声音的音锥，确定可以听到的区域：

trans-unit.source: Next, we start our draw() function off, again setting up a loop with requestAnimationFrame() so that the displayed data keeps updating, and clearing the display with each animation frame.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们关闭 draw() 函数，再次使用 requestAnimationFrame() 设置循环，以便显示的数据不断更新，并清除每个动画帧的显示。

trans-unit.source: Next, we start the process of actually rendering the scene onto the canvas, by setting the canvas to fill the entire browser viewport, and running the rendering loop (drawScene()) for the first time. This is the non-WebVR — normal — rendering loop.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们通过将画布设置为填充整个浏览器视口，并首次运行渲染循环（ drawScene() ），开始将场景实际渲染到画布上的过程。这是非WebVR（正常）渲染循环。

trans-unit.source: Next, we style the Information screen (wrapped in an <aside> element) how we want it, give it fixed position so that it doesn't appear in the layout flow and affect the main UI, transform it to the position we want it to sit in by default, and give it a transition for smooth showing/hiding:
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们按照需要的方式设置信息屏幕（包装在 <aside> 元素中）的样式，为其固定位置，使其不出现在布局流程中并影响主UI，将其转换为所需的位置默认情况下坐在其中，并对其进行过渡以使其平滑显示/隐藏：

trans-unit.source: Next, we update the progress and status information if any tasks have been enqueued.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,如果有任务被排队,我们会更新进度和状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Next, we use the ServiceWorkerContainer.register() function to register the service worker for this site, which is just a JavaScript file residing inside our app (note this is the file's URL relative to the origin, not the JS file that references it.)
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用 ServiceWorkerContainer.register() 函数为该站点注册服务工作者，这只是驻留在我们应用程序中的一个JavaScript文件（请注意，这是相对于来源的文件URL，而不是引用该URL的JS文件。 ）

trans-unit.source: Next, we used a loop to create the <tr> elements, which are children of the <tbody> element.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，我们使用循环来创建<tr>元素，这些元素是<tbody>元素的子元素。

trans-unit.source: Nodes and elements in a document may be dragged using the application/x-moz-node type. The data for the type should be a DOM node. This allows the drop target to receive the actual node where the drag was started from. Note that callers from a different domain will not be able to access the node even when it has been dropped.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 application/x-moz-node 类型拖动文档中的节点和元素。该类型的数据应为DOM节点。这允许放置目标接收拖动开始的实际节点。请注意，即使已删除该节点，来自其他域的呼叫者也将无法访问该节点。

trans-unit.source: Nodes can be removed. The following code removes text node myTextNode (containing the word "world") from the second <p> element, myP.
trans-unit.target: 可以删除节点。以下代码从第二个 <p> 元素 myP 中删除文本节点 myTextNode （包含单词“ world”）。

trans-unit.source: Nodes from external documents should be cloned using document.importNode() (or adopted using document.adoptNode()) before they can be inserted into the current document. For more on the Node.ownerDocument issues, see the W3C DOM FAQ.
trans-unit.target: 外部文档中的节点应使用 document.importNode() 进行克隆（或使用 document.adoptNode() 进行采用），然后才能插入当前文档。有关 Node.ownerDocument 问题的更多信息，请参见W3C DOM FAQ。

trans-unit.source: Nodes from external documents should be cloned using document.importNode() (or adopted using document.adoptNode()) before they can be inserted into the current document. For more on the Node.ownerDocument issues, see the W3C DOM FAQ.

Noise suppression automatically filters the audio to remove background noise, hum caused by equipment, and the like from the sound before delivering it to your code. This feature is typically used on microphones, although it is technically possible it could be provided by other input sources as well.
trans-unit.target: 噪声抑制自动过滤音频,以去除背景噪声、设备引起的嗡嗡声等,然后再将其传送到您的代码中。这一功能通常用于麦克风,尽管从技术上讲,它也可以由其他输入源提供。

trans-unit.source: Normally, scripts on different pages are allowed to access each other if and only if the pages they originate from share the same protocol, port number, and host (also known as the "same-origin policy"). window.postMessage() provides a controlled mechanism to securely circumvent this restriction (if used properly).
trans-unit.target: 通常，只有并且当它们源自的页面共享相同的协议，端口号和主机（也称为“ 同源策略 ”）时，才允许不同页面上的脚本相互访问。 window.postMessage() 提供了一种受控机制来安全地规避此限制（如果使用正确）。

trans-unit.source: Note also that only start and final endpoints of a path are affected: if a path is closed with closePath(), there's no start and final endpoint; instead, all endpoints in the path are connected to their attached previous and next segment using the current setting of the lineJoin style, whose default value is miter, with the effect of automatically extending the outer borders of the connected segments to their intersection point, so that the rendered stroke will exactly cover full pixels centered at each endpoint if those connected segments are horizontal and/or vertical). See the next two sections for demonstrations of these additional line styles.
trans-unit.target: 还要注意，仅影响路径的起点和终点：如果使用 closePath() 关闭路径，则没有起点和终点。取而代之的是，使用 lineJoin 样式的当前设置将路径中的所有端点连接到其连接的上一个和下一个分段，其默认值为 miter ，其作用是自动将连接的分段的外边界扩展到其交点，因此如果这些连接的段是水平和/或垂直的，则渲染的笔触将准确覆盖以每个端点为中心的完整像素。有关这些其他线条样式的演示，请参见以下两节。

trans-unit.source: Note also, that various browsers ignore the result of the event and do not ask the user for confirmation at all. The document will always be unloaded automatically. Firefox has a switch named dom.disable_beforeunload in about:config to enable this behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 还要注意，各种浏览器都忽略事件的结果，根本不要求用户进行确认。该文档将始终自动被卸载。Firefox 在about：config中有一个名为 dom.disable_beforeunload 的开关来启用此行为。

trans-unit.source: Note each handler calls preventDefault() to prevent additional event processing for this event (such as touch events or pointer events).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，每个处理程序都调用 preventDefault() 以防止对此事件进行其他事件处理（例如，触摸事件或指针事件）。

trans-unit.source: Note how we have used some feature detection to either give the browser the newer property values (like AudioListener.forwardX) for setting position, etc. if it supports those, or older methods (like AudioListener.setOrientation()) if it still supports those but not the new properties.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，我们如何使用某些功能检测为浏览器提供更新的属性值（如 AudioListener.forwardX ）以设置位置等（如果支持），或者为旧的方法（如 AudioListener.setOrientation() ）（如果它仍支持这些值）但不是新属性。

trans-unit.source: Note that as of Firefox 40, IndexedDB transactions have relaxed durability guarantees to increase performance (see bug 1112702.) Previously in a readwrite transaction IDBTransaction.oncomplete was fired only when all data was guaranteed to have been flushed to disk. In Firefox 40+ the complete event is fired after the OS has been told to write the data but potentially before that data has actually been flushed to disk. The complete event may thus be delivered quicker than before, however, there exists a small chance that the entire transaction will be lost if the OS crashes or there is a loss of system power before the data is flushed to disk. Since such catastrophic events are rare most consumers should not need to concern themselves further.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，从Firefox 40开始，IndexedDB事务具有宽松的持久性保证，以提高性能（请参阅bug1112702。）以前，在 readwrite 事务中，仅当确保已将所有数据刷新到磁盘时才触发 IDBTransaction.oncomplete 。在Firefox 40+中，会在操作系统被告知写入数据后但可能实际上未将数据刷新到磁盘之前触发 complete 事件。该 complete 因此，事件传递的速度可能比以前更快，但是，如果OS崩溃或在将数据刷新到磁盘之前失去系统电源，则很有可能丢失整个事务。由于这种灾难性事件很少发生，因此大多数消费者不需要进一步担心自己。

trans-unit.source: Note that being indirect-modify (changeable but only having read-methods), rules are NOT added or removed from the list directly, but instead here, only via its parent stylesheet. In fact, .insertRule() and .deleteRule() are not even methods of CSSRuleList, but only of CSSStyleSheet. If however, for some reason the list does need to be modified but has no parent stylesheet (perhaps being a livecopy of a list that does), it cannot just be assigned one (as it has no such property), and neither can it be assigned to one (as stylesheet.cssRules is read-only), but it must unfortunately be inserted into one, rule by rule, and unless combining lists, after any existing list therein is deleted, rule by rule.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于是间接修改（可更改，但仅具有读取方法），因此不会直接在列表中添加或删除规则，而是在此处仅通过其父样式表添加或删除规则。实际上， .insertRule() 和 .deleteRule() 甚至不是CSSRuleList的方法，而仅仅是 CSSStyleSheet 的方法。但是，如果由于某种原因确实需要修改列表但没有父样式表（也许是列表的实时副本），则不能仅为其分配一个（因为它没有此类属性），也不能分配给一个（因为stylesheet.css Rules 是只读的），但必须将其按规则插入一个规则中，除非合并列表，否则删除其中的任何现有列表后，应按规则进行。

trans-unit.source: Note that the maximum precision of suspension is the size of the render quantum and the specified suspension time will be rounded down to the nearest render quantum boundary. For this reason, it is not allowed to schedule multiple suspends at the same quantized frame. Also scheduling should be done while the context is not running to ensure the precise suspension.

trans-unit.source: Note that there are two different types of readable stream. As well as the conventional readable stream there is a type called a byte stream — this is an extended version of a conventional stream for reading underlying byte sources (otherwise known as BYOB, or “bring your own buffer”) sources. These allow streams to be read straight into a buffer supplied by the developer, minimizing the copying required. Which underlying stream (and by extension, reader and controller) your code will use depends on how the stream was created in the first place (see the ReadableStream.ReadableStream() constructor page).
trans-unit.target: 请注意，有两种不同类型的可读流。与常规的可读流一样，还有一种称为字节流的类型-这是常规流的扩展版本，用于读取底层的字节源（也称为BYOB，或“带上自己的缓冲区”）源。这些允许将流直接读取到开发人员提供的缓冲区中，从而最大程度地减少了所需的复制。您的代码将使用哪个基础流（以及扩展名，读取器和控制器）取决于流的创建方式（请参阅 ReadableStream.ReadableStream() 构造函数页面）。

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot change primary keys using cursor.update(), hence us not changing the album title; this would ruin the integrity of the data. In such a situation, you would have to delete the record altogether and then add a new one using IDBObjectStore.add. Note also that you can't directly put cursor.value into an update call, hence the below example using an intermediary updateData variable.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您不能使用 cursor.update() 更改主键，因此我们不会更改专辑标题。这会破坏数据的完整性。在这种情况下，您将必须完全删除该记录，然后使用 IDBObjectStore.add 添加一个新记录。还要注意，您不能直接将 cursor.value 放入更新调用中，因此下面的示例使用中间的 updateData 变量。

trans-unit.source: Note the minus value on our z orientation — this sets the boombox to face us. A positive value would set the sound source facing away from us.
trans-unit.target: 请注意我们z方向的负值-这会使动臂转向我们。正值会使声源远离我们。

trans-unit.source: Note the order in which we created the elements and the text node:
trans-unit.target: 注意我们创建元素和文本节点的顺序。

trans-unit.target: 请注意,在计算出的样式中,字体重量的值为 "bold",而在元素的样式属性中却没有这个值。

trans-unit.source: Note the retro cassette deck with a play button, and vol and pan sliders to allow you to alter the volume and stereo panning. We could make this a lot more complex, but this is ideal for simple learning at this stage.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,复古的卡带机有一个播放按钮,还有音量和平移滑块,让你改变音量和立体声平移。我们可以把它做得更复杂,但这非常适合现阶段的简单学习。

trans-unit.source: Note the use of MutationRecord.oldValue to get the previous value of the "username" property so we have that information when doing lookups in our local array of users.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，使用 MutationRecord.oldValue 可以获取 "username" 属性的先前值，因此在本地用户数组中进行查找时，我们将获得该信息。

trans-unit.source: Note there is no way to be certain, from the information received by the loadend event, as to which condition caused the operation to terminate; however, you can use this to handle tasks that need to be performed in all end-of-transfer scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，从 loadend 事件接收的信息中无法确定导致操作终止的条件。但是，您可以使用它来处理所有传输结束方案中需要执行的任务。

trans-unit.source: Note, in the above example, a more verbose XPath is preferred over common shortcuts such as //h2. Generally, more specific XPath selectors as in the above example usually gives a significant performance improvement, especially on very large documents. This is because the evaluation of the query spends does not waste time visiting unnecessary nodes. Using // is generally slow as it visits every node from the root and all subnodes looking for possible matches.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在上面的示例中，比普通的快捷方式（例如 //h2 )更优选使用更详细的XPath 。通常，上面示例中更具体的XPath选择器通常会显着提高性能，尤其是在非常大的文档上。这是因为对查询花费的评估不会浪费时间访问不必要的节点。使用//通常较慢，因为它会从根目录访问所有节点，并访问所有子节点以寻找可能的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Note: HTML drag and drop defines two different APIs to support dragging and dropping files. One API is the DataTransfer interface and the second API is the DataTransferItem and DataTransferItemList interfaces. This example illustrates the use of both APIs (and does not use any Gecko specific interfaces).
trans-unit.target: 注意： HTML drag and drop 定义了两个不同的API，以支持拖放文件。一个API是 DataTransfer 接口，第二个API是 DataTransferItem 和 DataTransferItemList 接口。此示例说明了两种API的用法（并且不使用任何Gecko特定的接口）。

trans-unit.source: Note: value must not contain "!important" -- that should be set using the priority parameter.
trans-unit.target: 注意： value 不得包含 "!important" ，应使用 priority 参数设置。

trans-unit.source: Note: Because there are no native tools to convert between Uint8Array, Unicode, hex, and base64, you'll probably want to use something like Unibabel or Buffer to convert between them.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于没有本机工具可以在Uint8Array，Unicode，十六进制和base64之间进行转换，因此您可能希望使用Unibabel或Buffer之类的工具在它们之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Note: Can no longer be set directly, as now specified to be functionally modify-only -- and *silently* so -- meaning that attempting to set it does absolutely *nothing* -- not even warn or error. Further, it has no settable sub-properties. Therefore, to modify, use the stylesheet's cssRules[index] properties .selectorText and .style (or its sub-properties). See Using dynamic styling information for details.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不能再直接设置，因为现在指定为仅功能修改-且* 静默 *这样-意味着试图对其进行设置绝对没有任何作用*甚至不会发出警告或错误。此外，它没有可设置的子属性。因此，要进行修改，请使用样式表的 cssRules [ index ]属性 .selectorText 和 .style （或其子属性）。有关详细信息，请参见使用动态样式信息。

trans-unit.target: 注意：如果 SVGNumber 是只读的，则在尝试更改该值时会引发代码为NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR 的 DOMException 。

trans-unit.target: 注意：Internet Explorer 6-8不支持此方法，而是提供了类似的 EventTarget.attachEvent API。为了实现跨浏览器的兼容性，请使用许多可用的JavaScript库之一。

trans-unit.source: Note: Returns the query string without the question mark. This is different from window.location.search which includes it.

trans-unit.source: Note: The StereoPannerNode is for simple cases in which you just want stereo panning from left to right. There is also a PannerNode, which allows for a great deal of control over 3D space, or sound spatialisation, for creating more complex effects. This is used in games and 3D apps to create birds flying overhead, or sound coming from behind the user for instance.
trans-unit.target: 注意： StereoPannerNode 仅用于简单的情况，您只需要从左到右进行立体声平移。还有一个 PannerNode ，它可以对3D空间或声音空间进行大量控制，以创建更复杂的效果。在游戏和3D应用中使用它来创建飞过头顶的鸟或声音，例如来自用户背后的声音。

trans-unit.target: 注意：标识符“ experimental-webgl ”或“ experimental-webgl2 ”也用于WebGL的实现中。这些实现尚未达到测试套件的一致性，或者平台上的图形驱动程序状况还不稳定。该Khronos组织证明在一定的WebGL实现的一致性规则。

trans-unit.source: Notice in the above document.body has been used as the context instead of document so the XPath starts from the body element. (In this example, the "." is important to indicate that the querying should start from the context node, document.body. If the "." was left out (leaving //h2) the query would start from the root node (html) which would be more wasteful.)
trans-unit.target: 注意，在上面的 document.body 中,它被用作上下文而不是 document ,因此XPath从body元素开始。 （在此示例中， "." 很重要，它指示查询应从上下文节点document.body开始。如果省略了“。”（保留 //h2 ），则查询将从根节点开始（ html ），这样会更浪费。）

trans-unit.source: Notice that both functions use a lock called my_resource. The do_read() requests a lock in 'shared' mode meaning that multiple calls may occur simultaneously across different event handlers, tabs, or workers.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，两个函数都使用名为 my_resource 的锁。所述 do_read() 请求在锁定 'shared' 模式意味着可以跨不同的事件处理程序，制表符，或工人同时发生多个呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the timer's name is displayed both when the timer is started and when it's stopped.

trans-unit.target: 请注意，当使用 timeLog() 记录计时器值时，以及在停止时再次显示计时器名称。

trans-unit.source: Notice that we log response.bodyUsed to the console once before the response.blob() call and once after. This returns false before and true afterwards, as at that point the body has been read.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在 response.blob() 调用之前和之后，我们都将 response.bodyUsed 登录到控制台。这将返回 false 之前和 true 之后，如在该点的身体已经阅读。

trans-unit.target: 请注意通过设置 ontimeout 处理程序来处理“超时”事件的代码。

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference between selection and focus. Document.activeElement returns the focused element.
trans-unit.target: 注意选择和焦点之间的区别。 Document.activeElement 返回聚焦的元素。

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference between selection and focus. Document.activeElement returns the focused element.

trans-unit.source: Notice the first frame contains an entire message (has FIN=1 and opcode!=0x0), so the server can process or respond as it sees fit. The second frame sent by the client has a text payload (opcode=0x1), but the entire message has not arrived yet (FIN=0). All remaining parts of that message are sent with continuation frames (opcode=0x0), and the final frame of the message is marked by FIN=1. Section 5.4 of the spec describes message fragmentation.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，第一帧包含完整的消息（具有 FIN=1 和 opcode!=0x0 ），因此服务器可以根据需要进行处理或响应。客户端发送的第二帧具有文本有效负载（ opcode=0x1 ），但是整个消息尚未到达（ FIN=0 ）。该消息的所有其余部分都带有连续帧（ opcode=0x0 ）发送，并且消息的最后一帧用 FIN=1 标记。规范的5.4节描述了消息分段。

trans-unit.source: Notice the first frame contains an entire message (has FIN=1 and opcode!=0x0), so the server can process or respond as it sees fit. The second frame sent by the client has a text payload (opcode=0x1), but the entire message has not arrived yet (FIN=0). All remaining parts of that message are sent with continuation frames (opcode=0x0), and the final frame of the message is marked by FIN=1. Section 5.4 of the spec describes message fragmentation.
Notice what happens when you hover your mouse cursor over the box, then move it away.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,当你将鼠标光标悬停在盒子上,然后将其移开,会发生什么。

trans-unit.source: Now all that's left to do is make sure we've loaded the sample before we are able to play the instrument. We'll add a loading screen that disappears when the file has been fetched and decoded, then we can allow the scheduler to start using the play button click event.

trans-unit.source: Now for a real example — what if we wanted to load images dynamically, but we wanted to make sure the images were loaded before we tried to display them? This is a standard thing to want to do, but it can be a bit of a pain. We can use .onload to only display the image after it’s loaded, but what about events that start happening before we start listening to them? We could try to work around this using .complete, but it’s still not foolproof, and what about multiple images? And, ummm, it’s still synchronous, so blocks the main thread.
trans-unit.target: 现在举一个真实的例子-如果我们想动态加载图像，但又想确保在尝试显示图像之前已加载图像该怎么办？这是要执行的标准操作，但可能会有些麻烦。我们可以使用 .onload 仅在加载图像后显示图像，但是在开始监听图像之前发生的事件又如何呢？我们可以尝试使用 .complete 来解决此问题，但是它仍然不是万无一失的，那么多张图像呢？而且，嗯，它仍然是同步的，因此阻塞了主线程。

In the final then, we'll have first-party storage access.

trans-unit.source: Now that the document structure is defined, construct the JavaScript code that will do the work. The goal: to be able to add requests to call functions to a queue, with an idle callback that runs those functions whenever the system is idle for long enough a time to make progress.

trans-unit.source: Now that we have a ball, we are ready to add a basic animation like we have learned in the last chapter of this tutorial. Again, window.requestAnimationFrame() helps us to control the animation. The ball gets moving by adding a velocity vector to the position. For each frame, we also clear the canvas to remove old circles from prior frames.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们有了一个球，我们准备添加一个基本的动画，就像在本教程的最后一章中学到的那样。同样， window.requestAnimationFrame() 可以帮助我们控制动画。通过将速度矢量添加到该位置来使球移动。对于每一帧，我们还清除画布以删除先前帧中的旧圆圈。

trans-unit.source: Now that we have set up our canvas environment, we can get into the details of how to draw on the canvas. By the end of this article, you will have learned how to draw rectangles, triangles, lines, arcs and curves, providing familiarity with some of the basic shapes. Working with paths is essential when drawing objects onto the canvas and we will see how that can be done.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们已经设置了画布环境，我们可以深入了解如何在画布上绘制。到本文结尾，您将学习如何绘制矩形，三角形，直线，圆弧和曲线，从而熟悉一些基本形状。将对象绘制到画布上时，使用路径至关重要，我们将看到如何做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Now that we've built a mechanism for exchanging messages, we need a protocol defining how those messages will look. This can be done in a number of ways; what's demonstrated here is just one possible way to structure signaling messages.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们已经建立了一个交换消息的机制,我们需要一个协议来定义这些消息的样子。这可以通过多种方式来实现;这里演示的只是一种可能的信号消息结构方式。

trans-unit.source: Now that we've created a video decoding configuration we can pass it as a paramater of the MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() method to determine if a video matching this configuration would be decodable and if the playback would be smooth and power efficient.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们已经创建了视频解码配置，我们可以将其作为 MediaCapabilities.decodingInfo() 方法的参数来传递，以确定与该配置匹配的视频是否可解码，以及回放是否流畅且省电。

trans-unit.source: Now that we've defined the two shaders we need to pass them to WebGL, compile them, and link them together. The code below creates the two shaders by calling loadShader(), passing the type and source for the shader. It then creates a program, attaches the shaders and links them together. If compiling or linking fails the code displays an alert.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们已经定义了两个着色器，我们需要将它们传递给WebGL，对其进行编译并将它们链接在一起。下面的代码通过调用 loadShader() 来创建两个着色器，并传递着色器的类型和源。然后，它创建一个程序，附加着色器并将它们链接在一起。如果编译或链接失败，代码将显示警报。

trans-unit.source: Now that we've got the task management and display maintenance code done, we can actually start setting up code to run tasks that get work done.
trans-unit.target: 现在,我们已经完成了任务管理和显示维护的代码,我们实际上可以开始设置运行任务的代码,以完成工作。

trans-unit.source: Now that we've started negotiation with the other peer and have transmitted an offer, let's look at what happens on the callee's side of the connection for a while. The callee receives the offer and calls handleVideoOfferMsg() function to process it. Let's see how the callee handles the "video-offer" message.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们已经开始与其他对等方进行协商并发送了要约，让我们看一下连接的被叫方发生了一段时间。被叫方收到要约，并调用 handleVideoOfferMsg() 函数对其进行处理。让我们看看被叫方如何处理 "video-offer" 消息。

trans-unit.source: Now that you are familiar with the basic concepts of the DOM, there is a document explaining the DOM Level 1 fundamental methods. It is the follow-up to this document.
trans-unit.target: 现在您已经熟悉了DOM的基本概念，现在有一个文档介绍了DOM Level 1的基本方法。这是本文档的后续内容。

trans-unit.source: Now that you have a transaction you need to understand its lifetime. Transactions are tied very closely to the event loop. If you make a transaction and return to the event loop without using it then the transaction will become inactive. The only way to keep the transaction active is to make a request on it. When the request is finished you'll get a DOM event and, assuming that the request succeeded, you'll have another opportunity to extend the transaction during that callback. If you return to the event loop without extending the transaction then it will become inactive, and so on. As long as there are pending requests the transaction remains active. Transaction lifetimes are really very simple but it might take a little time to get used to. A few more examples will help, too. If you start seeing TRANSACTION_INACTIVE_ERR error codes then you've messed something up.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您有一个事务，您需要了解其生命周期。事务与事件循环紧密相关。如果进行事务并不使用事件返回事件循环，则事务将变为非活动状态。使事务保持活动状态的唯一方法是对其进行请求。请求完成后，您将获得一个DOM事件，并假设请求成功，您将有另一个机会在该回调期间扩展事务。如果返回事件循环而不扩展事务，则它将变为非活动状态，依此类推。只要有待处理的请求，事务就保持活动状态。事务生存期确实非常简单，但是可能需要一点时间来习惯。其他一些示例也将有所帮助。如果您开始看到 TRANSACTION_INACTIVE_ERR 错误代码，那么您就搞砸了。

trans-unit.source: Now that you have a transaction, you'll need to get the object store from it. Transactions only let you have an object store that you specified when creating the transaction. Then you can add all the data you need.
trans-unit.target: 现在你已经有了一个事务,你需要从中获取对象存储。事务只让你拥有一个你在创建事务时指定的对象存储。然后你就可以添加你需要的所有数据。

trans-unit.source: Now to structure the database. IndexedDB uses object stores rather than tables, and a single database can contain any number of object stores. Whenever a value is stored in an object store, it is associated with a key. There are several different ways that a key can be supplied depending on whether the object store uses a key path or a key generator.
trans-unit.target: 现在构造数据库。 IndexedDB使用对象存储而不是表，并且单个数据库可以包含任意数量的对象存储。每当值存储在对象存储中时，它就会与键相关联。根据对象存储库是使用密钥路径还是密钥生成器，可以通过几种不同的方式提供密钥。

trans-unit.source: Now we can expand our playSweep() function. We need to add a GainNode and connect that through our audio graph to actually apply amplitude variations to our sound. The gain node has one property: gain, which is of type AudioParam.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以扩展 playSweep() 函数。我们需要添加一个 GainNode 并将其通过我们的音频图进行连接，以将振幅变化实际应用于我们的声音。增益节点具有一个属性： gain ，其类型为 AudioParam 。

trans-unit.source: Now we can fill it with random numbers between -1 and 1:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以用-1和1之间的随机数来填充它。

trans-unit.source: Now we can start setting our position and orientation of our boombox. This is a lot like how we did it with our listener. These are also the parameters we're going to change when the controls on our interface are used.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以开始设置我们的吊箱的位置和方向。这很像我们对监听器的设置。这些也是我们在使用界面上的控件时要改变的参数。

trans-unit.source: Now we have a VRDisplay object, we can use it do a number of things. The next thing we want to do is wire up functionality to start and stop presentation of the WebGL content to the display.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们有了一个 VRDisplay 对象，我们可以使用它来做很多事情。我们要做的下一件事是连接功能，以开始和停止将WebGL内容显示在显示器上。

trans-unit.source: Now we have the audio buffer and have filled it with data, we need a node to add to our graph that can use the buffer as a source. We'll create a AudioBufferSourceNode for this, and pass in the data we've created:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们有了音频缓冲区，并用数据填充了它，我们需要一个节点添加到图形中，该节点可以将缓冲区用作源。我们将为此创建一个 AudioBufferSourceNode ，并传入我们创建的数据：

trans-unit.source: Now we have to update our audio graph from before, so the input is connected to the gain, then the gain node is connected to the destination:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们要更新之前的音频图,所以输入连接到增益,然后增益节点连接到目的地。

trans-unit.source: Now we need to make some noise! All modems have noise. Noise is just random numbers when it comes to audio data, so is, therefore, a relatively straightforward thing to create with code.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们需要制造一些噪音!所有的调制解调器都有噪音。噪声只是音频数据的随机数字,因此,用代码创建噪声是一件比较简单的事情。

trans-unit.source: Now we need to update the drawScene() function to apply the current rotation to the square when drawing it. After translating to the initial drawing position for the square, we apply the rotation like this:
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们需要更新 drawScene() 函数，以在绘制正方形时将当前旋转应用于正方形。转换为正方形的初始绘图位置后，我们像这样应用旋转：

trans-unit.source: Now we retrieve the current VRPose from the VRFrameData.pose property, store the position and orientation for use later on, and send the current pose to the pose stats box for display, if the poseStatsDisplayed variable is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们从 VRFrameData.pose 属性检索当前 VRPose ，存储位置和方向以备后用，如果 poseStatsDisplayed 变量设置为true ，则将当前姿态发送到姿态统计框进行显示。

trans-unit.source: Now we run through a loop, defining the position of a small segment of the wave for each point in the buffer at a certain height based on the data point value form the array, then moving the line across to the place where the next wave segment should be drawn:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们通过循环运行,根据数组中的数据点值,在一定高度上为缓冲区中的每一个点定义一小段波段的位置,然后将线横移到下一个波段应该绘制的地方。

trans-unit.source: Now we set our barWidth to be equal to the canvas width divided by the number of bars (the buffer length). However, we are also multiplying that width by 2.5, because most of the frequencies will come back as having no audio in them, as most of the sounds we hear every day are in a certain lower frequency range. We don't want to display loads of empty bars, therefore we simply shift the ones that will display regularly at a noticeable height across so they fill the canvas display.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将 barWidth 设置为等于画布宽度除以条数（缓冲区长度）。但是，我们也将宽度乘以2.5，因为大多数频率会因为没有音频而返回，因为我们每天听到的大多数声音都处于某个较低的频率范围内。我们不想显示空条的负载，因此我们只是简单地将那些会定期以明显的高度显示的空条移动，以便它们填充画布显示。

trans-unit.source: Now we set up an event listener to run the requestPointerLock() method on the canvas when it is clicked, which initiates pointer lock.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们设置了一个事件侦听器，以在单击画布时在画布上运行 requestPointerLock() 方法，从而启动指针锁定。

trans-unit.source: Now we’ve got our streaming body, reading the stream requires attaching a reader to it. This is done using the ReadableStream.getReader() method:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们有了流媒体主体，读取流媒体需要在其上附加一个阅读器。这是使用 ReadableStream.getReader() 方法完成的：

trans-unit.source: Now we'll create a method to draw a box on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 现在我们将创建一个方法来在屏幕上画一个方框。

trans-unit.source: Now we're going to create a GainNode, as it's the gain value that we will oscillate with our second, low frequency oscillator:
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将创建一个 GainNode ，因为它将是我们第二个低频振荡器产生的 gain 值：

trans-unit.source: Now we're going to move our boombox around our 'room'. We've got some controls set up to do this. We can move it left and right, up and down, and back and forth; we can also rotate it. The sound direction is coming from the boombox speaker at the front, so when we rotate it, we can alter the sound's direction — i.e. make it project to the back when the boombox is rotated 180 degrees and facing away from us.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们将在我们的“房间”周围移动我们的音箱。我们已经设置了一些控件来执行此操作。我们可以左右，上下，来回移动它。我们也可以旋转它。声音的方向来自正面的扬声器，因此，当我们旋转它时，我们可以更改声音的方向，即，将扬声器旋转180度并背对我们时，使其向后投射。

trans-unit.source: Now we've retrieved some data, updating it and inserting it back into the IndexedDB is pretty simple. Let's update the previous example somewhat:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们已经检索到了一些数据,更新数据并将其插入到 IndexedDB 中是非常简单的。让我们对前面的例子进行一些更新。

trans-unit.source: Now you can figure out what DECODED means depending on your application.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您可以根据自己的应用确定“已解码”的含义。

trans-unit.source: Now you have the 2D rendering context for a canvas and you can draw within it.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您具有画布的2D渲染上下文，并且可以在其中进行绘制。

trans-unit.source: Now you’ve got your reader attached, you can read data chunks out of the stream using the ReadableStreamDefaultReader.read() method. This reads one chunk out of the stream, which you can then do anything you like with. For example, our Simple stream pump example goes on to enqueue each chunk in a new, custom ReadableStream (we will find more about this in the next section), then create a new Response out of it, consume it as a Blob, create an object URL out of that blob using URL.createObjectURL(), and then display it on screen in an <img> element, effectively creating a copy of the image we originally fetched.
trans-unit.target: 现在已经连接了阅读器，您可以使用 ReadableStreamDefaultReader.read() 方法从流中读取数据块。这将从流中读取一个块，然后您可以执行任何您喜欢的操作。例如，我们的简单流泵示例继续将每个块放入新的自定义 ReadableStream 中（我们将在下一节中找到更多信息），然后在其中创建一个新的 Response ，将其用作 Blob ，并创建一个使用 URL.createObjectURL() 从该Blob中提取对象URL ，然后在 <img> 元素中将其显示在屏幕上，从而有效地创建了我们最初获取的图像的副本。

trans-unit.source: Now you’ve got your site assets cached, you need to tell service workers to do something with the cached content. This is easily done with the fetch event.
trans-unit.target: 现在，您已经缓存了站点资产，您需要告诉服务人员对缓存的内容执行某些操作。使用 fetch 事件很容易做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Now your code will work even on browsers that don't support the Background Tasks API, albeit not as efficiently.
trans-unit.target: 现在你的代码即使在不支持后台任务API的浏览器上也能工作,尽管效率不高。

trans-unit.source: Now, assuming that the user allowed your request to create a database, and you've received a success event to trigger the success callback; What's next? The request here was generated with a call to indexedDB.open(), so request.result is an instance of IDBDatabase, and you definitely want to save that for later. Your code might look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 现在，假设该用户允许您创建数据库的请求，并且您已经收到一个成功事件以触发成功回调；下一步是什么？此处的请求是通过对 indexedDB.open() 的调用而生成的，因此 request.result 是 IDBDatabase 的实例，您肯定希望将其保存以备后用。您的代码可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.target: 现在，到工人。这里也有一些复杂性（worker.js）：

trans-unit.source: Now, the audio context we've created needs some sound to play through it. There are a few ways to do this with the API. Let's begin with a simple method — as we have a boombox, we most likely want to play a full song track. Also, for accessibility, it's nice to expose that track in the DOM. We'll expose the song on the page using an <audio> element.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们创建的音频上下文需要一些声音才能播放。有几种使用此API的方法。让我们从一个简单的方法开始-因为我们有一个音箱，所以我们很可能想播放完整的歌曲。另外，出于可访问性，很高兴在DOM中公开该轨道。我们将使用 <audio> 元素在页面上显示歌曲。

trans-unit.source: Now, we draw a green box up top, but shrink it by setting the w component to 1.1
trans-unit.target: 现在,我们在上面画一个绿色的盒子,但通过将w分量设置为1.1来缩小它。

trans-unit.source: Now, whenever the value of constantNode.offset changes, the gain on both gainNode2 and gainNode3 will change to have that same value.
trans-unit.target: 现在，每当 constantNode.offset 的值更改时， gainNode2 和 gainNode3 上的增益都将更改为具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Object URLs can be used for other things than just images! They can be used to display embedded PDF files or any other resources that can be displayed by the browser.
trans-unit.target: 对象URL不仅可以用于图像,还可以用于其他的东西!它们可以用于显示嵌入的PDF文件或任何其他可以由浏览器显示的资源。它们可以用来显示嵌入的PDF文件或任何其他可由浏览器显示的资源。

trans-unit.source: Object stores are created with a single call to createObjectStore(). The method takes a name of the store, and a parameter object. Even though the parameter object is optional, it is very important, because it lets you define important optional properties and refine the type of object store you want to create. In our case, we've asked for an object store named "customers" and defined a keyPath, which is the property that makes an individual object in the store unique. That property in this example is "ssn" since a social security number is guaranteed to be unique. "ssn" must be present on every object that is stored in the objectStore.
trans-unit.target: 通过一次调用 createObjectStore() 即可创建对象存储。该方法采用商店名称和参数对象。即使参数对象是可选的，它也非常重要，因为它使您可以定义重要的可选属性并优化要创建的对象存储的类型。在我们的例子中，我们要求一个名为“ customers”的对象存储，并定义了一个 keyPath ，该属性使存储中的单个对象变得唯一。在此示例中，该属性为“ ssn”，因为可以确保社会保险号是唯一的。 “ ssn”必须出现在 objectStore 中存储的每个对象上。

trans-unit.source: Objects in the CanvasRenderingContext2D rendering context have a current transformation matrix and methods to manipulate it. The transformation matrix is applied when creating the current default path, painting text, shapes and Path2D objects. The methods listed below remain for historical and compatibility reasons as SVGMatrix objects are used in most parts of the API nowadays and will be used in the future instead.
trans-unit.target: CanvasRenderingContext2D 渲染上下文中的对象具有当前的转换矩阵和对其进行操作的方法。创建当前默认路径，绘制文本，形状和 Path2D 对象时，将应用转换矩阵。出于历史和兼容性的原因，下面列出的方法仍然存在，因为 SVGMatrix 对象如今在API的大多数部分中都将使用，并且将来会使用。

trans-unit.source: Objects of these types are designed to hold small audio snippets, typically less than 45 s. For longer sounds, objects implementing the MediaElementAudioSourceNode are more suitable. The buffer contains data in the following format: non-interleaved IEEE754 32-bit linear PCM with a nominal range between -1 and +1, that is, 32bits floating point buffer, with each samples between -1.0 and 1.0. If the AudioBuffer has multiple channels, they are stored in separate buffer.
trans-unit.target: 这些类型的对象旨在容纳通常少于45 s的较小音频片段。对于更长的声音，实现 MediaElementAudioSourceNode 的对象更合适。该缓冲区包含以下格式的数据：标称范围在 -1 和 +1 之间的非交织IEEE754 32位线性PCM ，即32位浮点缓冲区，每个样本在-1.0和1.0之间。如果 AudioBuffer 具有多个通道，则将它们存储在单独的缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: Obtaining crisp lines requires understanding how paths are stroked. In the images below, the grid represents the canvas coordinate grid. The squares between gridlines are actual on-screen pixels. In the first grid image below, a rectangle from (2,1) to (5,5) is filled. The entire area between them (light red) falls on pixel boundaries, so the resulting filled rectangle will have crisp edges.
trans-unit.target: 要获得清晰的线条,需要了解路径的描画方式。在下面的图片中,网格代表画布坐标网格。网格线之间的方块是屏幕上的实际像素。在下面的第一张网格图像中,从(2,1)到(5,5)的矩形被填充。它们之间的整个区域(浅红色)落在像素边界上,所以填充后的矩形会有清晰的边缘。

trans-unit.source: Obtains an array of information about the media input and output devices available on the system.
trans-unit.target: 获取系统中可用的媒体输入和输出设备的一系列信息。

trans-unit.source: Obviously, browsers do not want to allow some advertising network or malicious website to pollute your computer, so browsers used to prompt the user the first time any given web app attempts to open an IndexedDB for storage. The user could choose to allow or deny access. Also, IndexedDB storage in browsers' privacy modes only lasts in-memory until the incognito session is closed (Private Browsing mode for Firefox and Incognito mode for Chrome, but in Firefox this is not implemented yet as of Nov 2015 so you can't use IndexedDB in Firefox Private Browsing at all).
trans-unit.target: 显然，浏览器不希望允许某些广告网络或恶意网站污染您的计算机，因此浏览器用于在任何给定的Web应用程序首次尝试打开IndexedDB进行存储时提示用户。用户可以选择允许或拒绝访问。另外，浏览器的隐私模式下的IndexedDB存储只会在内存中持续到隐身会话关闭为止（Firefox的私有浏览模式和Chrome的隐身模式，但是在Firefox中，截至2015年11月尚未实现，因此您不能使用Firefox私有浏览中的IndexedDB）。

trans-unit.source: Obviously, this is a simple example, implementing basic per-vertex lighting. For more advanced graphics, you'll want to implement per-pixel lighting, but this will get you headed in the right direction.
trans-unit.target: 很明显,这是一个简单的例子,实现了基本的每顶点照明。对于更高级的图形,你会想要实现每像素照明,但这将使你朝着正确的方向前进。

trans-unit.source: Obviously, this is somewhat contrived, since we know that the file's full path is "/data.json", having just looked it up ourselves, but the concept holds up for scenarios in which you don't know it.
trans-unit.target: 显然，这有点人为的，因为我们知道文件的完整路径是 "/data.json" ，只是我们自己查找了文件，但是这个概念适用于您不知道它的情况。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if a request is made on a source database that doesn't exist (e.g. has been deleted or removed.) In Firefox previous to version 41, an InvalidStateError was raised in this case as well, which was misleading; this has now been fixed (see bug 1176165.)
trans-unit.target: 如果对不存在的源数据库发出请求（例如已被删除或删除），则发生。在版本41之前的Firefox中，在这种情况下也会引发 InvalidStateError ，这会引起误解；现在，此问题已修复（请参见错误1176165）。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if an index with the same name already exists in the database. Index names are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库中已经存在相同名称的索引,则会发生。索引名称是区分大小写的。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if either:
trans-unit.target: 在下列情况下发生:

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the method was not called from a versionchange transaction callback. For older WebKit browsers, you must call first.
trans-unit.target: 如果未从版本 versionchange 事务回调中调用该方法，则发生。对于较旧的WebKit浏览器，必须先调用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the method was not called from a versionchange transaction mode callback.
trans-unit.target: 如果未从版本 versionchange 事务模式回调中调用该方法，则发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the provided keyPath is not a valid key path.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的 keyPath 不是有效的密钥路径，则发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the provided key path is a sequence, and multiEntry is set to true in the objectParameters object.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的键路径是序列，并且在 objectParameters 对象 multiEntry 设置为 true ，则发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the transaction this IDBObjectStore belongs to is not active (e.g. has been deleted or removed.) In Firefox previous to version 41, an InvalidStateError was raised in this case as well, which was misleading; this has now been fixed (see bug 1176165.)
trans-unit.target: 如果此 IDBObjectStore 所属的事务未激活（例如已被删除或删除），则发生。在版本41之前的Firefox中，在这种情况下，也会引发 InvalidStateError ，这会产生误解；现在，此问题已修复（请参见错误1176165）。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if there is no index with the given name (case-sensitive) in the database.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据库中没有给定名称的索引(区分大小写)时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a document is removed from a window or frame.
trans-unit.target: 当文档从窗口或框架中移除时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a document view is being moved along the x-axis, y-axis, or both axes.
trans-unit.target: 当文档视图沿着X轴、Y轴或两个轴移动时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an element does not load properly or a script runs incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: 当元素不能正确加载或脚本运行不正确时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when page loading is stopped before an element is loaded completely.
trans-unit.target: 当页面加载在元素完全加载前停止时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the browser has fully parsed the element and all of its descendants.
trans-unit.target: 当浏览器已完全解析该元素及其所有子代时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document view is being resized.
trans-unit.target: 在调整文档视图大小时发生。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the document zoom level or currentScale property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在文档缩放级别或currentScale属性更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: Of course the snippet above doesn't take into account the array method of vibration; persistent array-based vibration will require calculating the sum of the array items and creating an interval based on that number (with an additional delay, probably).
trans-unit.target: 当然上面的片段并没有考虑到数组方式的振动,基于数组的持久振动需要计算数组项目的总和,并根据这个数字创建一个区间(可能还有额外的延迟)。

trans-unit.source: Of course, "disconnected" and "closed" don't necessarily indicate errors; these can be the result of normal ICE negotiation, so be sure to handle these properly (if at all).
trans-unit.target: 当然,"断开 "和 "关闭 "不一定表示错误,这些可能是正常的ICE协商的结果,所以一定要正确处理这些问题(如果有的话)。

trans-unit.source: Of course, if transforms have been applied, the axes may have changed orientation.
trans-unit.target: 当然，如果已应用变换，则轴可能已更改方向。

trans-unit.source: Of course, there may be non-standard properties in this list, in which case you probably will find that the documentation link doesn't help much.
trans-unit.target: 当然,这个列表中可能存在非标准属性,在这种情况下,你可能会发现文档链接并没有什么帮助。

trans-unit.source: Of course, you wouldn't use someone's social security number as the primary key to a customer table because not everyone has a social security number, and you would store their birth date instead of their age, but let's ignore those unfortunate choices for the sake of convenience and move along.
trans-unit.target: 当然,你不会使用某人的社会安全号作为客户表的主键,因为不是每个人都有社会安全号,你会存储他们的出生日期而不是他们的年龄,但为了方便起见,让我们忽略这些不幸的选择,继续前进。

trans-unit.source: Of equal importance are the rules around notification. Browsers are required to display an indicator that shows that a camera or microphone is in use, above and beyond any hardware indicator that may exist. They must also show an indicator that permission has been granted to use a device for input, even if the device is not actively recording at the moment.
trans-unit.target: 同样重要的是关于通知的规则。浏览器必须显示一个指示器,表明正在使用摄像头或麦克风,而不是任何可能存在的硬件指示器。浏览器还必须显示一个指示器,表明已获准使用设备进行输入,即使该设备目前没有积极录制。
